title:
Is Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) a Winner in the Semiconductors 
Industry?
text:
Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) is the highest overall rated company in the Semiconductors industry with an overall score of 77. AMD is up 108.21% so far this year after the company closed yesterday at $174.23.  The overall score measures the company's performance based-off both short and long term indicators and means that AMD scores better than 77% of the overall market.





 AMD has an Overall Score of 77. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on AMD!
See Full AMD Report





Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. is a strong performer in the Semiconductors industry, which has an average overall score of 44. This means that, on average, the stocks in this industry score higher than 44% of the stock market.



 To see InvestorsObserver's  Sentiment Score for Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.  click here.

AMD has been trading neutral recently. The stock is trading down -2.02% this week following yesterday's rise. AMD has an average analyst ranking of Strong Buy with an average price target of $180.432.
